https://tmrev.io/movie/831092-A Measure of Our Humanity 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null This educational video illuminates Namibians' daily struggles with the global HIV/AIDS pandemic. The five sections explore poverty, education, stigma, gender inequality and justice through interviews with AIDS orphans, non-governmental organization leaders and HIV+ victims. A Measure of Our Humanity
